experience.title: Independent Retail Market Researcher
responsibilities: Conducted extensive field observations of consumer behavior and purchasing patterns within various high-traffic retail environments.
Analyzed visual merchandising strategies and their direct impact on customer engagement and department navigation.
Researched standard Point of Sale (POS) operations and inventory management workflows to ensure readiness for technical retail tasks.

experience.title: Customer Service Strategy Analyst
responsibilities: Synthesized industry best practices for conflict resolution and customer de-escalation through comprehensive case study reviews.
Developed a foundational understanding of sales KPIs including conversion rates, average transaction value, and units per transaction.
Practiced active listening and persuasive communication techniques based on established retail sales training frameworks.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
